requirements.Item2:
Blazor apps are composed of reusable web UI components implemented using C#, HTML, and CSS.

  • Basic knowledge of HTML and CSS (Bootstrap).
  • Familiarity with C#.
  • Some Razor knowledge.

project-structure.Item2:
Let's take a look at the structure of this Blazor app to understand how the demo will unfold.

  • WebAssembly in modern web browsers.
  • Writing client-side C# code.
  • Sharing code and libraries with .NET Standard.
  • Interoperability with JavaScript.

blazor-flavors.Item2:
Run on WebAssembly or the server.

  • Blazor App WebAssembly (client-side).
  • ASP.NET Blazor App (server-side).
